document.full_text: wells fargo & co , the fourth-largest u.s. bank, posted a decline in revenue, and shares fell 4.9 percent as a bank known for outsmarting rivals turned in an average performance.
document.title: wells fargo posts falling revenue, shares drop
lines_and_colors: wells fargo & co , the fourth-largest u.s. bank, posted a decline in revenue, and shares fell 4.9 percent as a bank known for outsmarting rivals turned in an average performance.
